name: Get The Last Spot! [Ludum Dare 51]
description:
How to Play:

10 seconds to play a level

10 second replay of your level play through

Get the last parking spot (blue glowing area) within 10 seconds. Get there before your rival gets the spot!

Failure restarts the level.

Success moves you to the next level

Controls:

W = Accelerate

A = Left

D = Right

S = Reverse

Space Bar = Brake

Assets Used:

All models, characters, and particle FX are from Synty Studios Polygon packs -- I used Prototype, Farm, Spy, Explorer, Town, and Fantasy Rivals (https://www.syntystudios.com/)

Character animations from Mixamo (https://www.mixamo.com)

Groove Club Music Pack by VOiD1 Gaming (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/groove-club-tune-bundle-demo-174394)

HALFTONE Sound Effects Pack LITE by VOiD1 Gaming (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/halftone-sound-effects-pack-lite-178439)

i6 German - FREE Engine Sound Pack by slaczky - Skril Studio (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/transportation/i6-german-free-engine-sound-pack-106037)

Farland Skies Skyboxes - Borodar (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/farland-skies-cloudy-crown-60004)
